book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲣⲓⲡⲙⲉⲉⲩⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓϣ ⲙ̅ⲫⲉⲃⲱⲱⲛ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉϩⲟⲟⲩ ⲙ̅ⲡⲥⲉⲓ ⲧⲙⲛ̅ⲧϩⲏⲕⲉ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲡⲉϭⲣⲱϩ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉϩⲟⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ⲧⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲣⲙ̅ⲙⲁⲟ.
English: When thou hast enough, remember the time of hunger: and when thou art rich, think upon poverty and need.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϫⲓⲛ ϩⲧⲟⲟⲩⲉ ⲅⲁⲣ ϣⲁ ⲣⲟⲩϩⲉ ⲡⲉⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓϣ ⲡⲱⲱⲛⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ϩⲛ̅ ⲗⲁⲁⲩ ⲧⲏⲣⲟⲩ ⲛⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲙ̅ⲧⲟ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ.
English: From the morning until the evening the time is changed, and all things are soon done before the Lord.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ⲥⲟⲫⲟⲥ ϣⲁϥⲣ̅ϩⲟⲧⲉ ϩⲛ̅ ϩⲱⲃ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲉϩⲟⲟⲩ ⲙ̅ⲡⲛⲟⲃⲉ ϣⲁϥⲥⲁϩⲱϥ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟϥ.
English: A wise man will fear in every thing, and in the day of sinning he will beware of offence: but a fool will not observe time.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁ ⲣⲙ̅ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲉⲓⲙⲉ ⲉⲧⲥⲟⲫⲓⲁ ⲁⲩⲱ ϣⲁⲥⲟⲩⲱⲛϩ̅ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲛⲧⲁϥϩⲉ ⲉⲣⲟⲥ
English: Every man of understanding knoweth wisdom, and will give praise unto him that found her.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ........... ⲁⲩⲣ̅ ⲥⲁⲃⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ϣⲁⲩⲃⲉⲉⲃⲉ ⲛ̅ϩⲉⲛⲡⲁⲣϩⲟⲓⲙⲓⲁ ⲉⲩⲟⲣϫ̅. ⲧⲉⲅⲕⲣⲁⲧⲓⲁ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉⲯⲩⲭⲏ.
English: They that were of understanding in sayings became also wise themselves, and poured forth exquisite parables.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲟⲩⲁϩⲕ̅ ⲛ̅ⲥⲁ ⲡⲉⲕⲟⲩⲱϣ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁⲙⲁϩⲧⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲕ ⲉⲛ ⲉⲧⲕ̅ⲟⲩⲁϣⲟⲩ.
English: Go not after thy lusts, but refrain thyself from thine appetites.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲕϣⲁⲛϯ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉⲯⲩⲭⲏ ⲙ̅ⲡⲟⲩⲱϣ ⲉⲧⲉϩⲛⲁⲥ ϣⲁⲥⲧⲣⲉ ⲛⲉⲕϫⲁϫⲉ ⲣⲁϣⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲕ.
English: If thou givest thy soul the desires that please her, she will make thee a laughingstock to thine enemies that malign thee.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲉⲩⲫⲣⲁⲛⲉ ⲉϫⲛ̅ ϩⲁϩ ⲛ̅ⲧⲣⲩⲫⲏ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲙⲟⲣⲕ̅ ⲉⲧⲉⲥⲥⲩⲙⲃⲟⲗⲏ.
English: Take not pleasure in much good cheer, neither be tied to the expense thereof.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ϣⲱⲡⲉ ⲉⲕϯⲥⲩⲙⲃⲟⲗⲏ ⲉⲕϫⲓ ⲉϫⲱⲕ ⲉⲛⲧⲕ̅ ⲟⲩϩⲏⲕⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲉⲙⲛ̅ ⲗⲁⲁⲩ ϣⲟⲟⲡ ⲛⲁⲕ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲉⲕⲧⲱⲱⲙⲉ.
English: Be not made a beggar by banqueting upon borrowing, when thou hast nothing in thy purse: for thou shalt lie in wait for thine own life, and be talked on.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲉⲣⲅⲁⲧⲏⲥ ⲣ̅ⲣⲉϥϯϩⲉ ϥⲛⲁⲣ̅ⲣⲙ̅ⲙⲁⲟ ⲁⲛ: ⲡⲉⲧϣⲱⲥ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲓ̈ϣⲁϫⲉ ϥⲛⲁϩⲉ ϣⲏⲙϣⲏⲙ.
English: A labouring man that is given to drunkenness shall not be rich: and he that contemneth small things shall fall by little and little.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲏⲣⲡ̅ ϩⲓ ⲥϩⲓⲙⲉ ⲡⲉϣⲥ̅ ⲛ̅ⲥⲁⲃⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲉⲧⲧⲱϭⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟϥ ⲉⲡⲟⲣⲛⲏ ϥⲛⲁⲣ̅ⲧⲟⲗⲙⲏⲣⲟⲥ.
English: Wine and women will make men of understanding to fall away: and he that cleaveth to harlots will become impudent.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϩⲛ̅ⲗⲟϥⲗⲉϥ ⲙⲛ̅ ϩⲉⲛϥⲛ̅ⲧ ⲛⲉⲧⲛⲁⲕⲗⲏⲣⲟⲛⲟⲙⲓ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟϥ: ⲧⲉⲯⲩⲭⲏ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲧⲟⲗⲙⲏⲣⲟⲥ ⲛⲁⲧⲁⲕⲟ.
English: Moths and worms shall have him to heritage, and a bold man shall be taken away.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲉϣⲁϥⲛⲁϩⲧⲉ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩϭⲉⲡⲏ ϥⲁⲥⲱⲟⲩ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉϥϩⲏⲧ: ⲡⲉⲧⲣ̅ⲛⲟⲃⲉ ⲉϩⲟⲩⲛ ⲉⲧⲉϥⲯⲩⲭⲏ ϥⲛⲁⲣ̅ϩⲧⲏϥ.
English: He that is hasty to give credit is lightminded; and he that sinneth shall offend against his own soul.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲉⲧⲉⲩⲫⲣⲁⲛⲉ ......ϫ.... ⲡⲉⲧⲙⲉⲥⲧⲉ ⲛⲣ̅ϩⲁϩ ⲛ̅ϣⲁϫⲉ ϥⲛⲁ....
English: Whoso taketh pleasure in wickedness shall be condemned: but he that resisteth pleasures crowneth his life. (6) He that can rule his tongue shall live without strife; and he that hateth babbling shall have less evil.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅..... ⲟⲩϣⲁϫⲉ ⲉⲛⲉϩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛ....ϣⲱⲱⲧ ⲁⲛ ⲛ̅ⲗⲁⲁⲩ.
English: Rehearse not unto another that which is told unto thee, and thou shalt fare never the worse.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ϣⲁϫⲉ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲙⲏⲧⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϣⲃⲏⲣ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩϫⲁϫⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲉϣϫⲉ ⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲕ̅ⲛⲟⲃⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲟⲩⲟⲛϩ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ.
English: Whether it be to friend or foe, talk not of other men’s lives; and if thou canst without offence, reveal them not.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϥⲛⲁⲥⲱⲧⲙ̅ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲉⲣⲟⲕ ⲛϥ̅ϯϩⲧⲏϥ ⲉⲣⲟⲕ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲉϥⲙⲉⲥⲧⲱⲕ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓϣ.
English: For he heard and observed thee, and when time cometh he will hate thee.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲕⲥⲱⲧⲙ̅ ⲉⲩϣⲁϫⲉ; ⲙⲁⲣⲉϥⲥⲙⲟⲩ ⲛⲙ̅ⲙⲁⲕ: ⲧⲱⲕ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲕ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϥⲣⲁϩⲧⲕ̅.
English: If thou hast heard a word, let it die with thee; and be bold, it will not burst thee.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲡⲥⲟϭ ϯⲛⲁⲁⲕⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲁϩⲣⲛ̅ ⲡϣⲁϫⲉ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉⲧⲛⲁⲙⲓⲥⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲁϩⲣⲛ̅ ⲡⲉⲥϣⲏⲣⲉ.
English: A fool travaileth with a word, as a woman in labour of a child.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲥⲟⲧⲉ ⲉϥⲧⲣ̅ⲧⲱⲣ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲙⲏⲣⲟⲥ ⲛ̅ⲥⲁⲣⲝ̅ ⲧⲁⲓ̈ ⲧⲉ ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϣⲁϫⲉ ϩⲛ̅ ⲑⲏ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲥⲟϭ.
English: As an arrow that sticketh in a man’s thigh, so is a word within a fool’s belly.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϫⲡⲓⲉ ⲡⲉⲕϣⲃⲏⲣ ϫⲉ ⲙⲉϣⲁϥ ⲙ̅ⲡϥ̅ⲁⲁⲥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲉϣϫⲉ ⲁϥⲁⲁⲥ ϫⲉ ⲛⲉϥⲟⲩⲁϩⲙⲉϥ.
English: Admonish a friend, it may be he hath not done it: and if he have done it, that he do it no more.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϫⲡⲓⲉ ⲡⲉⲕϣⲃⲏⲣ ϫⲉ ⲙⲉϣⲁϥ ⲙ̅ⲡϥ̅ϫⲟⲟⲥ: ⲉϣϫⲉ ⲁϥϫⲟⲟⲥ ϫⲉ ⲛⲉϥⲟⲩⲁϩⲙⲉϥ.
English: Admonish thy friend, it may be he hath not said it: and if he have, that he speak it not again.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϫⲡⲓⲉ ⲡⲉⲕϣⲃⲏⲣ ϫⲉ ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲇⲓⲁⲃⲟⲗⲏ ⲅⲁⲣ ϣⲱⲡⲉ ⲛ̅ϩⲁϩ ⲛ̅ⲥⲟⲡ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲧⲁⲛϩⲉⲧ ϣⲁϫⲉ ⲛⲓⲙ.
English: Admonish a friend: for many times it is a slander, and believe not every tale.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲛ̅ ⲡⲉϣⲁϥⲥⲗⲁⲁⲧⲉ ⲉⲛⲧⲁϥⲁⲁⲥ ⲁⲛ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉϥϩⲏⲧ ..........................
English: There is one that slippeth in his speech, but not from his heart; and who is he that hath not offended with his tongue?

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϫⲡⲓⲉ ⲡⲉⲕϣⲃⲏⲣ ⲉⲙⲡⲁⲧⲕ̅ⲛⲟⲩϭⲥ̅ ⲉⲣⲟϥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲅ̅ϯ ⲡⲙⲁ ⲙ̅ⲡⲛⲟⲙⲟⲥ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲧϫⲟⲥⲉ.
English: Admonish thy neighbour before thou threaten him; and not being angry, give place to the law of the most High.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲥⲟⲫⲓⲁ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲡⲉ ⲑⲟⲧⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲓⲣⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲛⲟⲙⲟⲥ ϩⲛ̅ ⲥⲟⲫⲓⲁ ⲛⲓⲙ.
English: The fear of the Lord is all wisdom; and in all wisdom is the performance of the law, and the knowledge of his omnipotency.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲉ ⲡⲟⲛⲏⲣⲓⲁ ⲥⲃⲱ ⲛ̅ⲥⲟⲫⲓⲁ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲟⲩⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲣⲙ̅ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧ ⲁⲛ ⲡⲉ ⲟⲩϣⲟϫⲛⲉ ⲛ̅ⲣⲉϥⲣ̅ⲛⲟⲃⲉ.
English: The knowledge of wickedness is not wisdom, neither at any time the counsel of sinners prudence.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲡⲟⲛⲏⲣⲓⲁ ⲉⲩⲃⲟⲧⲉ ⲧⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲟⲩⲛ̅ ⲁⲑⲏⲧ ⲉϥϣⲁⲁⲧ ⲛ̅ⲥⲟⲫⲓⲁ.
English: There is a wickedness, and the same an abomination; and there is a fool wanting in wisdom.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛⲁⲛⲟⲩ ⲡⲉⲧϣⲁⲁⲧ ⲙ̅ⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲣⲙ̅ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧ ⲉϥⲟ ⲛ̅ϩⲟⲧⲉ ⲉϩⲟⲩⲟ ⲉⲡⲉⲧⲟϣ ⲙ̅ⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲣⲙ̅ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧ ⲉϥⲡⲁⲣⲁⲃⲁ ⲙ̅ⲡⲛⲟⲙⲟⲥ.
English: He that hath small understanding, and feareth God, is better than one that hath much wisdom, and transgresseth the law of the most High.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲡⲟⲛⲏⲣⲓⲁ ⲉⲥⲟⲣϫ̅ ⲉⲩϫⲓⲛ̅ϭⲟⲛⲥ̅ ⲧⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲟⲩⲛ̅ ⲡⲉϣⲁϥⲧⲁⲕⲟ ϫⲉ ⲉϥⲉϫⲓ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϩⲁⲡ.
English: There is an exquisite subtilty, and the same is unjust; and there is one that turneth aside to make judgment appear; and there is a wise man that justifieth in judgment.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲛ̅ ⲡⲉⲧⲟ ⲙ̅ⲡⲟⲛⲏⲣⲟⲥ ⲉⲣⲉ ϫⲱϥ ⲃⲏϩ ⲉⲡⲉⲥⲏⲧ ⲉϥϩⲏⲡ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲉⲣⲉ ⲡⲉϥϩⲟⲩⲛ ⲙⲉϩ ⲛ̅ⲕⲣⲟϥ:
English: There is a wicked man that hangeth down his head sadly; but inwardly he is full of deceit,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉϥⲡⲱϩⲧ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥϩⲟ ⲉⲡⲉⲥⲏⲧ ⲉϥⲱⲃϣ̅ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟϥ ⲉϥⲛⲁⲣ̅ϣⲟⲣⲡ̅ ⲉⲣⲟⲕ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲙⲁ ⲉⲧⲕ̅ⲛⲁⲧⲁⲛϩⲟⲩⲧϥ̅ ⲉⲣⲟϥ ⲁⲛ.
English: Casting down his countenance, and making as if he heard not: where he is not known, he will do thee a mischief before thou be aware.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉϣⲱⲡⲉ .... ⲉϥϣⲁⲛ ϩⲉ ⲉⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓϣ ϥ...... ϩⲛ̅ϣⲁϫⲉ ⲛ̅ⲙ̅ⲡⲁⲣⲁⲃⲟⲗⲏ.
English: And if for want of power he be hindered from sinning, yet when he findeth opportunity he will do evil.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁⲩⲛ̅ⲟⲓ̈ ⲛ̅ⲣ̅ⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲧⲣⲉⲩⲛⲁⲩ ⲉⲣⲟⲟⲩ ⲁⲩⲱ ϣⲁⲩⲥⲟⲩⲛ̅ ⲡⲥⲁⲃⲉ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲧⲱⲙⲛ̅ⲧ ⲉⲣⲟϥ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥϩⲟ.
English: A man may be known by his look, and one that hath understanding by his countenance, when thou meetest him.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲧϭⲟⲟⲗⲉⲥ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲡⲥⲱⲃⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϥⲛⲁϫϩⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲧⲉϥϭⲓⲛⲙⲟⲟϣⲉ ⲧⲁⲙⲟⲕ ⲉⲣⲟϥ.
English: A man’s attire, and excessive laughter, and gait, shew what he is.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲛ̅ ϫⲡⲓⲟ ⲉⲛⲉⲥⲱϥ ⲁⲛ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲟⲩⲛ̅ ⲡⲉⲧⲕⲱ ⲛ̅ⲣⲱϥ ⲉⲩⲥⲁⲃⲉ ⲡⲉ.
English: There is a reproof that is not comely: again, some man holdeth his tongue, and he is wise.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉϣϫⲉ ⲛⲁⲛⲟⲩ ϫⲡⲓⲟ ⲉϩⲟⲩⲟ ⲉϭⲱⲛⲧ̅ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲉⲧⲣ̅ϩⲧⲏϥ ⲛⲁⲁⲙⲁϩⲧⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟϥ ⲉⲡⲛⲟⲃⲉ.
English: How good is it, when thou art reproved, to shew repentance! for so shalt thou escape wilful sin.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉϣϫⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉⲡⲓⲑⲩⲙⲓⲁ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲥⲓⲟⲩⲣ ⲉⲣ̅ ⲟⲩⲡⲁⲣⲑⲉⲛⲟⲥ ⲛ̅ⲥϩⲓⲙⲉ ⲧⲁⲓ̈ ⲧⲉ ⲑⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲧⲉⲓⲣⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϩⲃⲏⲩⲉ ⲛ̅ϭⲟⲛⲥ̅.
English: As is the lust of an eunuch to deflower a virgin; so is he that executeth judgment with violence.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲛ̅ ⲡⲉⲧⲕⲱ ⲛ̅ⲣⲱϥ ⲉϣⲁⲩϩⲉ ⲉⲣⲟϥ ⲛ̅ⲥⲁⲃⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲟⲩⲛ̅ ⲡⲉϣⲁⲩⲙⲉⲥⲧⲱϥ ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ⲧⲉϥⲙⲛ̅ⲧϩⲁϩ ⲛ̅ϣⲁϫⲉ.
English: There is one that keepeth silence, and is found wise: and another by much babbling becometh hateful.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲛ̅ ⲡⲉⲧⲕⲱ ⲛ̅ⲣⲱϥ ⲉⲙⲛ̅ⲧϥ̅ ϣⲁϫⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲁⲩ ⲉϫⲱ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲟⲩⲛ̅ ⲡⲉⲧⲕⲱ ⲛ̅ⲣⲱϥ ⲉϥϭⲱϣⲧ̅ ⲉⲡⲉⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓϣ ⲛ̅ϣⲁϫⲉ.
English: Some man holdeth his tongue, because he hath not to answer: and some keepeth silence, knowing his time.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ⲥⲁⲃⲉ ϣⲁϥⲕⲁ ⲣⲱϥ ϣⲁ ⲡⲉⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓϣ .......... ϣⲁϥⲣ̅... ⲉⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓϣ.
English: A wise man will hold his tongue till he see opportunity: but a babbler and a fool will regard no time.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲉⲧⲟ ⲛ̅ϩⲁϩ ⲛ̅ϣⲁϫⲉ ϣⲁⲩϥⲱⲧⲉ .... ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲉϯⲣⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥϩⲧⲟⲣ ⲥⲉⲛⲁⲙⲉⲥⲧⲱϥ.
English: He that useth many words shall be abhorred; and he that taketh to himself authority therein shall be hated.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲥⲟⲟⲩⲧⲛ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣⲱⲙⲉ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉϥⲡⲉⲧⲛⲁⲛⲟⲩⲟⲩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲟⲩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩϭⲓⲛⲉ ϣⲟⲟⲡ ⲉⲩϣⲱⲱⲧ ⲡⲉ.
English: There is a sinner that hath good success in evil things; and there is a gain that turneth to loss.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲟⲩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩϯ ⲉⲛϥ̅ⲣ̅ⲛⲟϥⲣⲉ ⲛⲁⲕ ⲁⲛ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲟⲩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩϯ ⲉⲣⲉ ⲡⲉϥⲧⲱⲱⲃⲉ ⲕⲏⲃ.
English: There is a gift that shall not profit thee; and there is a gift whose recompence is double.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲛ̅ ⲡⲉⲧⲣ̅ϭⲣⲱϩ ϫⲉ ⲁⲩϯⲉⲟⲟⲩ ⲛⲁϥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲟⲩⲛ̅ ⲡⲉⲛⲧⲁϥϫⲓⲥⲉ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉϥⲑⲃ̅ⲃⲓⲟ.
English: There is an abasement because of glory; and there is that lifteth up his head from a low estate.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲛ̅ ⲡⲉⲧϣⲉⲡ ϩⲁϩ ϩⲁ ⲟⲩⲕⲟⲩⲓ̈ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛϥ̅ⲧⲟⲟⲃⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ⲥⲁϣϥ̅ ⲛ̅ⲕⲱⲃ.
English: There is that buyeth much for a little, and repayeth it sevenfold.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲥⲟⲫⲟⲥ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉϥϣⲁϫⲉ ϣⲁϥⲧⲣⲉⲩⲙⲉⲣⲓⲧϥ̅ ⲛⲉⲭⲁⲣⲓⲥ ⲇⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲥⲟϭ ⲛⲁⲡⲱⲱⲛⲉ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ.
English: A wise man by his words maketh him beloved: but the graces of fools shall be poured out.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙⲛ̅ ϯ ⲛ̅ⲁⲑⲏⲧ ⲛⲁⲣ̅ⲛⲟϥⲣⲉ ⲛⲁⲕ: ϩⲁϩ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲛⲉ ⲛⲉϥⲃⲁⲗ ⲉⲡⲙⲁ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲁ.
English: The gift of a fool shall do thee no good when thou hast it; neither yet of the envious for his necessity: for he looketh to receive many things for one.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϥⲛⲁϯ ⲛⲁⲕ ⲛ̅ϩⲛ̅ⲕⲟⲩⲓ̈ ⲛϥ̅ϫⲡⲓⲟⲕ ⲉⲙⲁⲧⲉ ⲛϥ̅ⲟⲩⲏⲛ ⲛ̅ⲣⲱϥ ⲉϫⲱⲕ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲕⲏⲣⲩⲝ̅.
English: He giveth little, and upbraideth much; he openeth his mouth like a crier;

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϥⲛⲁϯ ⲛⲁⲕ ⲥⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲟⲟⲩ ⲛϥ̅ⲧⲟⲕ ⲥⲉ ⲛ̅ⲣⲁⲥⲧⲉ: ⲟⲩⲙⲉⲥⲧⲉ ⲡⲉ ⲡⲉⲓ̈ⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉⲓ̈ϩⲉ.
English: to day he lendeth, and to morrow will he ask it again: such an one is to be hated of God and man.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲡⲥⲟϭ ϫⲟⲟⲥ ϫⲉ ⲙⲛ̅ϯ ϣⲃⲏⲣ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙⲛ̅ ϩⲙⲟⲧ ϣⲟⲟⲡ ⲛ̅ⲛⲁⲡⲉⲧⲛⲁⲛⲟⲩⲟⲩ: ⲉⲩϩⲟⲟⲩ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉⲩⲗⲁⲥ ⲛ̅ϭⲓ ⲛⲉⲧⲟⲩⲱⲙ ⲛ̅ⲛⲁⲟⲉⲓⲕ.
English: The fool saith, I have no friends, I have no thank for all my good deeds, and they that eat my bread speak evil of me.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϩⲁϩ ⲛ̅ⲥⲟⲡ ....ⲛ ⲟⲩⲙⲏⲏϣⲉ ..
English: How oft, and of how many shall he be laughed to scorn! for he knoweth not aright what it is to have; and it is all one unto him as if he had it not.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛⲁⲛⲟⲩ ... ⲙ̅ⲡⲕⲁϩ ⲉϩⲟⲩ ⲉ....ⲗⲁⲥ: ⲧⲁⲓ̈ ⲧⲉ ⲑⲉ ⲉⲧⲉⲣⲉ ⲡⲉϩⲧⲟⲡ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲑⲟⲟⲩ ⲛⲏⲩ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩϭⲉⲡⲏ
English: To slip upon a pavement is better than to slip with the tongue: so the fall of the wicked shall come speedily.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ⲁⲧϩⲙⲟⲧ ⲟⲩϣⲁϫⲉ ⲡⲉ ... ⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓϣ ⲉϥⲛⲁⲁϣⲁⲓ̈ ϩⲛ̅ ⲣⲱⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲁⲧⲥⲃⲱ.
English: An unseasonable tale will always be in the mouth of the unwise.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁⲩⲥⲧⲟ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ⲧⲡⲁⲣⲁⲃⲟⲗⲏ ϩⲛ̅ ⲣⲱϥ ⲙ̅ⲡⲥⲟϭ: ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϥϫⲟⲟⲥ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲥⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓϣ.
English: A wise sentence shall be rejected when it cometh out of a fool’s mouth; for he will not speak it in due season.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲛ̅ ⲡⲉⲧⲉⲛϥⲣ̅ⲛⲟⲃⲉ ⲁⲛ ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ⲧⲉϥⲙⲛ̅ⲧϩⲏⲕⲉ.
English: There is that is hindered from sinning through want: and when he taketh rest, he shall not be troubled.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲛ̅ ⲡⲉϣⲁϥⲥⲉⲣⲙ̅ ⲧⲉϥⲯⲩⲭⲏ ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ϣⲓⲡⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛϥ̅ⲧⲁⲕⲟ ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ϫⲓϩⲟ.
English: There is that destroyeth his own soul through bashfulness, and by accepting of persons overthroweth himself.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲛ̅ ⲡⲉϣⲁϥⲉⲣⲏⲧ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥϣⲃⲏⲣ ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ⲡϣⲓⲡⲉ.
English: There is that for bashfulness promiseth to his friend, and maketh him his enemy for nothing.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩϫⲃⲓⲛ ⲉϥϩⲟⲟⲩ ⲡⲉ ⲡϭⲟⲗ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲣⲱⲙⲉ: ⲉϥⲛⲁⲁϣⲁⲓ̈ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲧⲁⲡⲣⲟ ⲛ̅ⲛⲁⲧⲥⲃⲱ.
English: A lie is a foul blot in a man, yet it is continually in the mouth of the untaught.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛⲁⲛⲟⲩ ⲟⲩⲣⲉϥϩⲱϥⲧ ⲉϩⲟⲩ ⲉⲟⲩⲣⲉϥⲁϣⲁⲓ̈ ⲛ̅ϫⲓϭⲟⲗ ⲉⲩⲕⲗⲏⲣⲟⲛⲟⲙⲓ ⲇⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲧⲁⲕⲟ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲥⲛⲁⲩ.
English: A thief is better than a man that is accustomed to lie: but they both shall have destruction to heritage.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲥⲱϣ ⲡⲉ ⲫⲏⲧ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ⲣⲉϥϫⲓϭⲟⲗ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲉϥϣⲓⲡⲉ ⲟϣ ⲛⲉⲙⲁϥ.
English: The disposition of a liar is dishonourable, and his shame is ever with him.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲡⲥⲟⲫⲟⲥ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉϥϣⲁϫⲉ ϩⲟⲛϥ̅ ⲉϩⲟⲩⲛ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲟⲩⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ⲥⲁⲃⲉ ϣⲁϥⲁⲣⲉⲥⲕⲉ ⲛ̅...
English: A wise man shall promote himself to honour with his words: and he that hath understanding will please great men.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: .... ⲡⲉϥⲕⲁϩ ϥ.... ...... ⲁⲣⲉⲥⲕⲉ ⲛ̅ϩⲛ̅ⲁ... ⲉϥⲛⲁⲣ̅.... ϫⲓⲛ̅ϭⲟⲛⲥ̅.
English: He that tilleth his land shall increase his heap: and he that pleaseth great men shall get pardon for iniquity.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛ̅ⲧⲁⲉⲓⲟ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲛ̅ⲇⲱⲣⲟⲛ ϣⲁ ...ⲙ̅ ⲛ̅ⲃⲁⲗ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲥⲟⲫⲟⲥ ⲁⲩⲱ ϣⲁϥⲕⲧⲟ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϫⲡⲓⲟ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϣⲧⲟⲃ ⲉϥϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲧⲁⲡⲣⲟ.
English: Presents and gifts blind the eyes of the wise, and stop up his mouth that he cannot reprove.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲥⲟⲫⲓⲁ ⲉⲥϩⲏⲡ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲁϩⲟ ⲉⲛϥ̅ⲟⲩⲟⲛϩ̅ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲁⲛ ⲟⲩ ⲡⲉ ⲡⲉⲩϩⲏⲩ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲥⲛⲁⲩ;
English: Wisdom that is hid, and treasure that is hoarded up, what profit is in them both?

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛⲁⲛⲟⲩ ⲟⲩⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲉϥϩⲱⲡ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉϥⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲥⲟϭ ⲉϩⲟⲩⲟ ⲉⲟⲩⲁ ⲉϥϩⲱⲡ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉϥⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲥⲁⲃⲉ.
English: Better is he that hideth his folly than a man that hideth his wisdom.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲁϣⲏⲣⲉ ⲁⲕⲣ̅ⲛⲟⲃⲉ; ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲟⲩⲱϩ ⲉⲧⲟⲟⲧⲕ̅ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲥⲟⲡⲥ̅ ϩⲁ ⲛⲉⲕⲛⲟⲃⲉ ⲛ̅ϣⲟⲣⲡ̅.
English: My son, hast thou sinned? do so no more, but ask pardon for thy former sins.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲱⲧ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲙ̅ⲡⲛⲟⲃⲉ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲧⲡⲏⲧ ϩⲏⲧϥ̅ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϩⲟϥ: ⲉⲕϣⲁⲛϯ ⲡⲉⲕⲟⲩⲟⲓ̈ ⲉϩⲟⲩⲛ ϥⲛⲁⲗⲟⲕⲥⲕ̅:
English: Flee from sin as from the face of a serpent: for if thou comest too near it, it will bite thee:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϩⲛ̅ⲛⲁϫϩⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲩⲓ̈ ⲛⲉ ⲛⲉϥⲛⲁϫϩⲉ.
English: the teeth thereof are as the teeth of a lion, slaying the souls of men.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲣⲉ ⲁⲛⲟⲙⲓⲁ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲟ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲥⲏϥⲉ ⲛϩⲟ ⲥⲛⲁⲩ ⲉⲙⲛ̅ ⲧⲁⲗϭⲟ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲉⲥⲡⲗⲏⲅⲏ.
English: All iniquity is as a two edged sword, the wounds whereof cannot be healed.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲟⲩⲛⲟⲩϣⲥ̅ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲥⲱϣ ϣⲉϥ ⲟⲩⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲣⲙ̅ⲙⲁⲟ: ⲧⲁⲓ̈ ⲧⲉ ⲑⲉ ⲉⲣⲉ ⲡⲏⲓ̈ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ϫⲁⲥⲓ ϩⲏⲧ ⲛⲁϣⲱϥ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲥ. ⲁⲩⲱ ....
English: To terrify and do wrong will waste riches: thus the house of proud men shall be made desolate.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲥⲟⲡⲥ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡϩⲏⲕⲉ ϫⲓⲛ ⲣⲱϥ ⲡⲉ ϣⲁ ⲛⲉϥⲙⲁⲁϫⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲉϥϩⲁⲡ ⲛ̅ⲛⲏⲩ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩϭⲉⲡⲏ.
English: A prayer out of a poor man’s mouth reacheth to the ears of God, and his judgment cometh speedily.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉϥⲙⲟⲥⲧⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲧϫⲡⲓⲟ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲟⲩⲱⲛϩ̅ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣⲉϥⲣ̅ⲛⲟⲃⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲉⲧⲣ̅ϩⲟⲧⲉ ϩⲏⲧϥ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲛⲁⲕⲧⲉ ⲡⲉϥϩⲏⲧ.
English: He that hateth to be reproved is in the way of sinners: but he that feareth the Lord will repent from his heart.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲇⲩⲛⲁⲧⲟⲥ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉϥⲗⲁⲥ ⲟⲩⲟⲛϩ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲙ̅ⲡⲟⲩⲉ ⲡⲣⲉϥⲛⲟⲉⲓ ⲇⲉ ⲉⲓⲙⲉ ⲉϥϣⲁⲛⲥⲗⲁⲁⲧⲉ.
English: An eloquent man is known far and near; but a man of understanding knoweth when he slippeth.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲣⲉ ⲡⲉⲧⲕⲱⲧ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥⲏⲓ̈ ϩⲛ̅ ϩⲛ̅ⲭⲣⲏⲙⲁ ⲉⲛⲛⲟⲩϥ ⲁⲛ ⲛⲉ ⲉϥⲟ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲧⲥⲱⲟⲩϩ ⲉϩⲟⲩⲛ ⲛ̅ϩⲛ̅ⲱⲛⲉ ⲉⲩⲭⲓⲙⲱⲛ.
English: He that buildeth his house with other men’s money is like one that gathereth himself stones for the tomb of his burial.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲗⲁⲥ ⲉϥϩⲟⲟⲩ ⲡⲉ ⲧⲥⲩⲛⲁⲅⲱⲅⲏ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲁⲛⲟⲙⲟⲥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲧⲉⲩϩⲁⲏ ⲡⲉ ⲟⲩϣⲁϩ ⲛ̅ⲕⲱϩⲧ̅.
English: The congregation of the wicked is like tow wrapped together: and the end of them is a flame of fire to destroy them.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲧⲉϩⲓⲏ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲣⲉϥⲣ̅ⲛⲟⲃⲉ ⲟⲩ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲧⲉ ϩⲛ̅ ϩⲛ̅ⲱⲛⲉ ⲉⲥⲥⲏϣ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲧⲉⲥϩⲁⲏ ⲡⲉ ⲡⲉϩⲓⲉⲓⲧ ⲛ̅ⲁⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲉ.
English: The way of sinners is made plain with stones, but at the end thereof is the pit of hell.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲉⲧⲁⲣⲉϩ ⲉⲡⲛⲟⲙⲟⲥ ⲛⲁⲁⲙⲁϩⲧⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϥⲙⲉⲉⲩⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲧⲉϥϩⲁⲏ ⲡⲉ ⲑⲟⲧⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ.
English: He that keepeth the law of the Lord getteth the understanding thereof: and the perfection of the fear of the Lord is wisdom.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙⲁⲣⲉ ⲡⲁⲧϩⲏⲧ ϫⲓⲥⲃⲱ ⲟⲩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲣⲙ̅ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧ ⲇⲉ ⲉϣⲁⲥⲧⲁϣⲉ ⲡⲓⲕⲣⲓⲁ.
English: He that is not wise will not be taught: but there is a wisdom which multiplieth bitterness.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲥⲟⲟⲩⲛ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲥⲟⲫⲟⲥ ⲛⲁⲁϣⲁⲓ̈ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ .... ... ⲉⲣⲉ ⲡⲉϥϣⲟϫⲛⲉ [ⲟ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ] ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲡⲏⲅⲏ ⲛ̅ⲱⲛϩ̅.
English: The knowledge of a wise man shall abound like a flood: and his counsel is like a pure fountain of life.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲣⲉ ⲛ̅ⲥⲁ ⲛ̅ϩⲟⲩⲛ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲥⲟϭ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϩⲛⲁⲁⲩ ⲉϥⲟⲩⲟϣϥ̅ ⲉⲛⲛⲉϥⲉϣⲁⲙⲁϩⲧⲉ ⲛ̅ⲥⲟⲟⲩⲛ ⲛⲓⲙ.
English: The inner parts of a fool are like a broken vessel, and he will hold no knowledge as long as he liveth.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲣϣⲁⲛ ⲟⲩⲥⲁⲃⲉ ⲥⲉⲧⲙ̅ ⲟⲩϣⲁϫⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲣⲙ̅ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧ ϣⲁϥⲧⲁⲉⲓϥ ⲛϥ̅ⲟⲩⲱϩ ⲉⲣⲟϥ: ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲡⲉⲧⲥⲡⲁⲧⲁⲗⲁ ⲇⲉ ⲥⲟⲧⲙⲉϥ ⲙⲁϥⲣ̅ⲁⲛⲁϥ. ⲁⲩⲱ ϣⲁϥⲛⲟϫϥ̅ ϩⲓⲡⲁϩⲟⲩ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟϥ.
English: If a skilful man hear a wise word, he will commend it, and add unto it: but as soon as one of no understanding heareth it, it displeaseth him, and he casteth it behind his back.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲣⲉ ⲡϣⲁϫⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲥⲟϭ ⲟ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲉⲧⲡⲱ ϩⲓ ⲟⲩϩⲓⲏ ϣⲁⲩϩⲉ ⲇⲉ ⲉⲩⲭⲁⲣⲓⲥ ϩⲓ ⲛⲉⲥⲡⲟⲧⲟⲩ ⲙ̅ⲡⲥⲁⲃⲉ.
English: The talking of a fool is like a burden in the way: but grace shall be found in the lips of the wise.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁⲩϣⲓⲛⲉ ⲛ̅ⲥⲁ ⲧⲧⲁⲡⲣⲟ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲥⲁⲃⲉ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲙⲏⲏϣⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ϣⲁⲩⲙⲉⲕⲙⲟⲩⲕⲟⲩ ⲉⲛⲉϥϣⲁϫⲉ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉⲩϩⲏⲧ.
English: They enquire at the mouth of the wise man in the congregation, and they shall ponder his words in their heart.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲏⲓ̈ ⲉϥⲧⲁⲕⲏⲩ ⲧⲁⲓ̈ ⲧⲉ ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲥⲟⲫⲓⲁ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲥⲟϭ ⲁⲩⲱ ϩⲛ̅ϣⲁϫⲉ ⲉⲙⲡⲟⲩϫⲛ̅ϫⲱⲛⲟⲩ ⲛⲉ ⲡⲥⲟⲟⲩⲛ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲥⲟϭ.
English: As is a house that is destroyed, so is wisdom to a fool: and the knowledge of the unwise is as talk without sense.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲣⲉ ⲧⲉⲥⲃⲱ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲥⲟϭ ⲟ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲓⲡⲁⲓⲇⲉⲥ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉϥⲟⲩⲉⲣⲏⲧⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲓⲡⲁⲓⲇⲉⲥ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲉϥϭⲓϫ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲛⲁⲙ.
English: Doctrine unto fools is as fetters on the feet, and like manacles on the right hand.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁⲣⲉ ... ⲟⲩⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ⲥⲁⲃⲉ ⲙⲟⲅⲓⲥ ⲛϥ̅ⲛⲉⲧϥ.
English: A fool lifteth up his voice with laughter; but a wise man doth scarce smile a little.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲣⲉ ⲧⲉⲥⲃⲱ ⲟ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲕⲟⲥⲙⲟⲥ ⲛ̅ⲛⲟⲩⲃ ⲙ̅ⲡⲥⲁⲃⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ϩⲛ̅ⲧⲱⲧⲉ ϩⲓϫⲛ̅ ⲟⲩϭⲃⲟⲓ̈ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲛⲁⲙ.
English: Learning is unto a wise man as an ornament of gold, and like a bracelet upon his right arm.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲉⲣⲏⲧⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲥⲟϭ ϭⲉⲡⲏ ⲉϩⲟⲩⲛ̅ ⲉⲡⲏⲓ̈ ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲟⲩⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲇⲉ ⲉϥⲧⲥⲁⲃⲏⲩ ϣⲓⲡⲉ ϩⲏⲧϥ̅ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲣⲱⲙⲉ.
English: A foolish man’s foot is soon in his neighbour’s house: but a man of experience is ashamed of him.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲡⲁⲑⲏⲧ ⲥⲟⲩⲧⲛ̅ ϫⲱϥ ⲉϩⲟⲩⲛ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣⲟ ⲙ̅ⲡⲏⲓ̈ ⲟⲩⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲇⲉ ⲉϥⲧⲥⲁⲃⲏⲩ ϣⲁϥⲱϩ ⲉⲣⲁⲧϥ̅ ϩⲓⲣⲛ̅ ⲡⲣⲟ.
English: A fool will peep in at the door into the house: but he that is well nurtured will stand without.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲁⲧⲥⲃⲱ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲡⲉ ϫⲓⲥⲙⲏ ϩⲓⲣⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲣⲟ ⲡⲥⲁⲃⲉ ⲇⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲟϥ ϣⲁϥϥⲓ ϩⲁ ⲡⲉϥϣⲱⲥ.
English: It is the rudeness of a man to hearken at the door: but a wise man will be grieved with the disgrace.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛⲉⲥⲡⲟⲧⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ϩⲁϩ ⲛⲁϣⲁϫⲉ ⲉⲣⲟϥ.
English: The lips of talkers will be telling such things as pertain not unto them: but the words of such as have understanding are weighed in the balance.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲣⲉ ⲫⲏⲧ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲥⲟϭ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲉϥⲧⲁⲡⲣⲟ ⲫⲏⲧ ⲇⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲥⲁⲃⲉ ⲡⲉ ⲣⲱⲟⲩ.
English: The heart of fools is in their mouth: but the mouth of the wise is in their heart.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲧⲣⲉ ⲡⲁⲥⲉⲃⲏⲥ ⲥⲁϩⲟⲩ ⲙ̅ⲡⲥⲁⲧⲁⲛⲁⲥ ⲉϥⲥⲁϩⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉϥⲯⲩⲭⲏ ⲙ̅ⲙⲓⲛ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟϥ.
English: When the ungodly curseth Satan, he curseth his own soul.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲣⲉϥⲕⲁⲥⲕⲥ̅ ⲛⲁⲧⲱⲗⲙ̅ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉϥⲯⲩⲭⲏ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲥⲉⲛⲁⲙⲉⲥⲧⲱϥ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉϥⲙⲁ ⲛ̅ϭⲟⲉⲓⲗⲉ.
English: A whisperer defileth his own soul, and is hated wheresoever he dwelleth.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲣⲉ ⲡⲣⲉϥϫⲛⲁⲁⲩ ⲧⲛ̅ⲧⲱⲛ ⲉⲩⲱⲛⲉ ⲉϥϩⲟⲣϣ̅ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲟⲩⲟⲛ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲛⲁϥⲓ ϣⲙ̅ϣⲏϭⲉ ⲉϫⲛ̅ ⲡⲉϥϣⲱⲥ.
English: A slothful man is compared to a filthy stone, and every one will hiss him out to his disgrace.
Greek: Λίθῳ ἠρδαλωµένῳ συνεβλήθη ὀκνηρός, καὶ πᾶς ἐκσυριεῖ ἐπὶ τῇ ἀτιµίᾳ αὐτοῦ.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲣⲉ ⲡⲣⲉϥϫⲛⲁⲁⲩ ⲧⲛ̅ⲧⲱⲛ ⲉⲩϩⲟⲉⲓⲣⲉ ⲛ̅ⲥⲟⲧ ..... ϥⲛⲁⲛⲉϩ ⲧⲉϥϭⲓϫ.
English: A slothful man is compared to the filth of a dunghill: every man that takes it up will shake his hand.
Greek: βολβίτῳ κοπρίων συνεβλήθη ὀκνηρός, πᾶς ὁ ἀναιρούµενος αὐτὸν ἐκτινάξει χεῖρα.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩϣⲓⲡⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲉⲓⲱⲧ ⲡⲉ ⲟⲩϣⲏⲣⲉ ⲛ̅ⲁⲧⲥⲃⲱ ⲧϣⲉⲉⲣⲉ ⲇⲉ ⲉⲑⲟⲟⲩ ⲟⲩϫⲡⲟ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϭⲣⲱϩ ⲧⲉ.
English: An evilnurtured man is the dishonour of his father that begat him: and a foolish daughter is born to his loss.
Greek: αἰσχύνη πατρὸς ἐν γεννήσει ἀπαιδεύτου, θυγάτηρ δὲ ἐπ’ ἐλαττώσει γίνεται.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲧϣⲉⲉⲣⲉ ⲛ̅ⲥⲁⲃⲏ ⲛⲁⲕⲗⲏⲣⲟⲛⲟⲙⲉⲓ ⲙⲡⲉⲥϩⲁⲓ̈ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲧⲣⲉϥϯϣⲓⲡⲉ ⲟⲩⲗⲓⲡⲏ ⲧⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲥⲉⲓⲱⲧ.
English: A wise daughter shall bring an inheritance to her husband: but she that liveth dishonestly is her father’s heaviness.
Greek: θυγάτηρ φρονίµη κληρονοµήσει ἄνδρα αὐτῆς, καὶ ἡ καταισχύνουσα εἰς λύπην γεννήσαντος·

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲧⲛⲁϣⲧⲙ̅ⲙⲉ ϯϣⲓⲡⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲥⲉⲓⲱⲧ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲡⲉⲥϩⲁⲓ̈. ⲁⲩⲱ ϣⲁⲥϫⲓⲥⲱϣ ϩⲓⲧⲟⲟⲧⲟⲩ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲥⲛⲁⲩ.
English: She that is bold dishonoureth both her father and her husband, but they both shall despise her.
Greek: πατέρα καὶ ἄνδρα καταισχύνει ἡ θρασεῖα καὶ ὑπὸ ἀµφοτέρων ἀτιµασθήσεται.
